prompt: Will the people who are in the same house be equal in their salaries?
completion: No. It is up to the housemaster(s) of the house you belong to.

prompt: Is it guaranteed that all roommates will have the same rent?
completion: No. It depends on the agreement made among the roommates or the decision of the landlord.

prompt: Will everyone in a family has equal say in decision-making?
completion: No. It may depend on factors such as age, position, or experience within the family.

prompt: Are all employees in a company paid the same salary?
completion: No. Salaries may vary based on job position, experience, qualifications, and other factors.

prompt: Are all students in a class graded based on the same criteria?
completion: No. Grading may depend on factors such as class participation, homework, exams, projects, and individual performance.
